# userHandle

**Instance Property**

The user handle of this passkey credential.

## Declaration

```swift
var userHandle: Data { get }
```

## Discussion

Use the user handle, along with the [doc://com.apple.authenticationservices/documentation/AuthenticationServices/ASPasskeyCredentialIdentity/credentialID], to identify the correct credential to use for a given relying party request.

## Associating a user

- **userName**: The username of this passkey credential.

items.description: The username of this passkey credential.
items.name: userName
